Finding out what the network has learned

I'd love to know what the network was doing when it makes it predictions. Could use this to explore activation maps and other techniques that might give some insight - is it learning the pictures...

What if I mix up the pictures (so you have different illustrations of the same character - can I make it look at the japanese?)
